#summary Sunny Hirai's Version of the Module Pattern

= Sunny Hirai's Module Pattern =

Based on Douglas Crockford's articles on the Module Pattern with a healthy dosage of pragmatism added.

{{{
$.extend({
  animal: function( name ){
    var me = {
      init: function(){
        me.name = name;
      },
      say: function( msg ){
        alert( msg );
      }
    }
    me.init();
    return me;
  }
})
}}}
